capability.name: Security Assurance
capability.definition: Security Assurance capability provides comprehensive security testing and validation services to ensure organizational security countermeasures are effective and appropriate. It maintains a portfolio of security checks and performs targeted assurance testing across multiple threat categories.
capability.role: Maintain and apply a portfolio of security assurance checks, target selective assurance tests to ensure security countermeasures are in place and appropriate
capability.example: A security check of a new product operation is performed considering multiple threat categories
